articles.author: Geoff Lemon
articles.title: Tenacious Australia offer hope for World Test Championship - The Guardian
articles.description: The World Test Championship showdown in June will provide a fascinating postscript to India’s Border-Gavaskar series victory
articles.content: In 2017, Australias Test team came home from India after four Tests with a 2-1 defeat. In 2023, the scoreline was the same. In the first series, the tourists made the better of a turning pitch to win… [+4800 chars]
